title: Ad Copy for Google Waterloo Launch Event
description: We’re looking for a sharp ad copywriter to craft compelling copy for a fall Google Pixel launch event in Waterloo. This is a short-term project focused on event ads, taglines, and campaign messaging that highlight the Pixel’s unique features. Ideal candidates can quickly capture brand voice, generate engaging ad concepts, and deliver polished copy on tight timelines.”

milestones.title: Phase One: Ads and Taglines
milestones.description: Ideal candidates can quickly capture brand voice, generate engaging ad concepts, and deliver polished copy on tight timelines.

milestones.title: Phase Two:  Campaign messaging A/B Test
milestones.description: This is a short-term project focused on event ads, taglines, and campaign messaging that highlight the Pixel’s unique features.

milestones.title: Phase Three: Analytics and Review
milestones.description: Incorporate client feedback and polish copy for final approval. This stage ensures all messaging is consistent, accurate, and event-ready.
